mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply ( reply_no, contents, depth, parent_reply, delete_check, reg_dt, post_no, member_email ) VALUES ( REPLY_SEQ.nextval, #{contents}, #{depth}, #{parentReply}, #{deleteCheck}, sysdate, #{postNo}, #{memberEmail} )
mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(reply REPLY_PK) */ reply_no AS replyNo, contents AS contents, depth AS depth, parent_reply AS parentReply, delete_check AS deleteCheck, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') THEN TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD') END AS regDt, post_no AS postNo, member_email AS memberEmail FROM reply WHERE post_no = #{postNo}
